tool_description: US and state flag half-staff events in JSON format.
title: Flag Status

api_list.name: Get half-staff events for given flag
api_list.description: Get all half-staff events for the provided flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/events/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the half-staff flag events for California?
I want to find out when the flag was at half-staff in Texas.
Please provide the half-staff flag events for Florida.
Could you list the half-staff flag days for New York?
What are the half-staff flag events recorded for Illinois?
Give me the half-staff flag event details for Washington state.
I need to see all half-staff flag occasions for Massachusetts.
Show me the half-staff flag events for Pennsylvania.
Can you provide the half-staff flag event history for Ohio?
List all the half-staff flag events for Georgia.

api_list.name: Get current status for given flag
api_list.description: Get the current status for the provided flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/status/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the current flag status for California?

api_list.name: Get all half-staff events for every flag
api_list.description: Get every half-staff event for the last 365 days
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the half-staff flag events that have happened in the past year?
I want to see a list of every flag half-staff event from the last 365 days.
Please provide all the US and state flag half-staff events recorded over the previous year.
Could you give me a summary of all half-staff flag days in the last 12 months?
Show me every occasion when flags were flown at half-staff during the past year.
I need a complete list of half-staff flag events for the last 365 days across all states.
Retrieve all flag half-staff events that occurred within the last year.
Give me all the half-staff flag events from the past 365 days for both US and state flags.
List every half-staff event for flags in the US and states over the last year.
Can you fetch all the flag half-staff events that have taken place in the last 365 days?
